item.title: R to @higekieiyu: You’re not wrong, friend.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: You’re not wrong, friend.

item.title: R to @KlauraLenda: That’s a very good price. If your husband doesn’t agree then I pity the fool.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: That’s a very good price. If your husband doesn’t agree then I pity the fool.

item.title: R to @TheBloggess: After hearing from lots of health care people (thank you!) Hailey's going to isolate from us at least a few days and stay home at least through next week. They're not exactly crushed at having to binge-watch Dance Moms in bed for a week while having food delivered to their door.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: After hearing from lots of health care people (thank you!) Hailey's going to isolate from us at least a few days and stay home at least through next week. They're not exactly crushed at having to binge-watch Dance Moms in bed for a week while having food delivered to their door.

item.title: R to @TheBloggess: Anyway, wash your hands. Get your boosters. Stay hydrated. Love.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: Anyway, wash your hands. Get your boosters. Stay hydrated. Love.

item.title: R to @TheBloggess: Did a telehealth call with a dr who said they don’t need to quarantine (which *kind of* makes sense bc it’s been 5 days since their symptoms began) & that they don’t need to wear a mask around us (CDC says 10 days?) and now I’m questioning everything.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: Did a telehealth call with a dr who said they don’t need to quarantine (which *kind of* makes sense bc it’s been 5 days since their symptoms began) & that they don’t need to wear a mask around us (CDC says 10 days?) and now I’m questioning everything.

item.title:
Worst cake pop ever.
After 5 days of feeling mild to moderately sick and multiple negative tests Hailey took one final one just to be sure and…they have fucking Covid. I apologize if the sound of their entirely valid “I TOLD YOU SO” set off your car alarms.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description:
Worst cake pop ever.

After 5 days of feeling mild to moderately sick and multiple negative tests Hailey took one final one just to be sure and…they have fucking Covid. I apologize if the sound of their entirely valid “I TOLD YOU SO” set off your car alarms.

item.title:
It’s hard being blue in Texas, but I’ve seen so many Republican friends and family shift left in the last years. Some stopped voting. Some will be voting Democrat this year for the first time ever. Some were convinced by their children or grandchildren.
There’s hope, y’all.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description:
It’s hard being blue in Texas, but I’ve seen so many Republican friends and family shift left in the last years. Some stopped voting. Some will be voting Democrat this year for the first time ever. Some were convinced by their children or grandchildren.

There’s hope, y’all.

item.title: RT by @TheBloggess: We will overcome this decision in Texas by winning political power.
item.dc:creator: @BetoORourke
item.description: We will overcome this decision in Texas by winning political power.

item.title: Keep fighting. Do what you can. Pace yourself. Let your anger push you forward…don’t let it destroy you.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: Keep fighting. Do what you can. Pace yourself. Let your anger push you forward…don’t let it destroy you.

item.title: RT by @TheBloggess: The same SCOTUS that said yesterday that states don’t have the ability to regulate guns today gave states the power to regulate women’s bodies.
item.dc:creator: @shannonrwatts
item.description: The same SCOTUS that said yesterday that states don’t have the ability to regulate guns today gave states the power to regulate women’s bodies.

item.title: R to @zmulls: Absolutely.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

item.title:
Just spent several long minutes waiting for my toast to pop out of the toaster only to realize I never put the bread in.
How’s your morning?
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description:

item.title: Sometimes I write things that I think are funny but that I'm not sure if anyone else in the world will think are funny and usually they stay in drafts but today I'm sharing one because I can't even tell anymore. https://thebloggess.com/2022/06/21/baby-jesus-doesnt-need-your-likes-probably/
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

item.title: Heres what I want: to be emailed every time there's an election I personally need to vote in, with a breakdown of what I'm supposed to vote for and why, but not get the emails about how we're all about to die if I don't give another $50. Does this exist?
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description: Heres what I want: to be emailed every time there's an election I personally need to vote in, with a breakdown of what I'm supposed to vote for and why, but not get the emails about how we're all about to die if I don't give another $50. Does this exist?

item.title:
You’re writing…fishing for new ideas. You feel a bite. Is it the muse?
No. It is Hunter S Thomcat under your desk. “Bring me catnip, you hack” he seems to whisper. “Let’s ditch this 9-5 bullshit and get fucked up.”
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess
item.description:
You’re writing…fishing for new ideas. You feel a bite. Is it the muse?

No. It is Hunter S Thomcat under your desk. “Bring me catnip, you hack” he seems to whisper. “Let’s ditch this 9-5 bullshit and get fucked up.”
